title: Hallmark Hotels Dev. Agrmt. for Crowne Plaza

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 28     INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN PHYLLIS YOUNG    An ordinance approving and authorizing the city to execute a development agreement with Hallmark Hotels, LLC; prescribing the form and details of said agreement and the taking of further actions with respect thereto; authorizing the taking of other actions, approval and execution of other documents necessary or desirable to carry out and comply with the intent thereof; and containing a severability clause.
